sentences.sCn: 那张桌子是什么形状的？

sentences.sContent: You can recognize a tree by the shape of its leaves.
sentences.sCn: 可以根据树叶的形状辨认出是什么树。

sentences.sContent: His battered old hat had completely lost its shape.
sentences.sCn: 他那顶破旧的帽子已经完全变形了。

sentences.sContent: The plants grow in every shape and size .
sentences.sCn: 这些植物有各种形状，各种大小。

sentences.sContent: The children cut out shapes (= squares, triangles etc ) from the piece of cardboard.
sentences.sCn: 孩子们把卡纸片剪成各种形状。

synos.tran: 形成；塑造，使成形；使符合

phrases.pCn: 在外形上；处于良好状态
v. 形成；成形；体现；具体化
精神或身体状态好；处于很好的状态；良好的体形；体力好

words.tran: 合适的；成某种形状的；有计划的
定形的；形状美观的；样子好的；有条理的
不成形的；不定形的；不象样的
[电子] 整形器，脉冲整形器；[机] 牛头刨床；造型者；塑造者
发展；成形（shape的过去分词和过去式）

trans.tranOther: the form that something has, for example round, square,  triangular  etc

trans.tranCn: 形成；塑造，使成形；使符合
trans.tranOther: to influence something such as a belief, opinion etc and make it develop in a particular way
